entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (mtp_hideout_access_strilath_farles_01.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_23: I need some information from you.
entries.s_25: I want to know where the main Meatlump Hideout is.
entries.s_26: Oh really. Ha, that's...hmm. Wait a second. Tell you what, if you help me with a little problem, I'll tell you what you want to know.
entries.s_28: Important people talking about important stuff over here. Good-bye now.
entries.s_29: Okay, okay. You win. I've had enough. Man, you really need to relax a bit. Life is too short, man.
entries.s_4: Get rid of those Ragtags for me, and I'll help you. I promise. Really.
entries.s_46: Some local Ragtags keep messing with me and my work. That's partly why I agreed to a relocation to another planet, but I'd still like to stick it to those Ragtags. Take them out for me, and we can deal.
